name: portfolio-site
description: Portfolio website with React frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/dist backend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
